body: So from what I'm seeing, The Shota caught his older sister fucking a man (likely whoring herself to make ends meet) which damaged his view of his "pure perfect older sister" and ended up spurting to the act, being a kid and not knowing what was going on and emotional her ran away and came across the witch. Stranger Danger came into effect as she made his trauma worse and throwing it out there! She rapes young boys to steal their "time" to keep herself young seeing how he's older at the end and his sister is looking for him in fear (and the witch is taunting him with it as they can hear her calling to hurt him even more that his sister DOES care for him, but because he was a bad boy, they'll never see each other again. Bad boy in that he never should have peeped, ran away for no reason or go off with a stranger and eat "weird things") That's my summary anyway!
